author: Reuters Editorial
title: Factbox: Top acquisitions in Canada's pot industry
text:
(Reuters) - Aurora Cannabis announced a C$3.2 billion ($2.51 billion) deal to buy rival MedReleaf Corp on Monday, the latest in a wave of mergers among pot growers in Canada. The deals come as Canada moves to legalize cannabis for recreational use.
Compiled by Yashaswini Swamynathan in Bengaluru
